title: (14960) Rute - 205 Calle Francisco Salto
description: Large parking lot for Motorhomes. Buses and cars usually park, very close to the Rute Center and Museums of Anis, Jamón... also panoramic view. From there you can exit to go to the Tower

title: (14960) Rute - 45 Calle Paseo del Fresno
description: Close to the Anis Museum, whose owner said we could park for the night there after tasting the product! It is clearly used for events and there are toilets there. The town aire (N37.331450 W4.373337) is also good but beware - water is no longer available, only emptying although it is still signed as Motorhome Services.

title: (14960) Rute - 1 Calle Antonio Llamas Cruz
description: New area that replaces the previous one next to the 6-seater municipal soccer field, signs of expansion and better luck

title: (14960) Rute - 19 Calle de los Olivos
description: Motorhomes next to the municipal sports zone center. Parking is good and quiet. Download services, but the water is now working.

title: () Rute - Unnamed Road
description: Fuente Alta Recreational Area. It is an area with tables and seats to spend the day outdoors. It has a source of untreated water. You can do some hiking route. There is very little space to park. It is next to some tennis courts. The access is quite narrow but we have accessed with a 7.5 meter motorhome

name: Camping La Isla
title: (14960) Camping La Isla
description: 3rd category campsite. a lot of unevenness in most of the squares. access to electricity in the square, water must be fetched from a source to fill the CV and auto CV. The sewage must be taken to be emptied in a toilet behind the bar. Greywater to the ground directly. there are no barbecues. many dogs of the owners and of the campers loose, without a muzzle. electricity is shared and breaks frequently. PRICE in April 2023 we paid for 2 days 2 adults and 2 children in a caravan 76 euros.

title: (14960) Rute - 90 Poblado del Pantano
description: Great view...nothing going on during the week...1.4km running route, swimming in the lake and 5km bike ride to the supermarket...

title: (14960) Rute - 77 Poblado del Pantano
description: Old bus parking area for the hermitage, very quiet and surrounded by nature. Very discreet.

title: (14960) Rute - 90 Poblado del Pantano
description: Nice flat parking for about 5 vans. Surrounded by trees. Easy accessible. Nice view over the lake. Lake 200m down the road. Unfortunately a lot of trash around, but I will clean. So please take your trash! :)

title: (14960) Rute - 74 Poblado del Pantano
description: Camping type area at the foot of the swamp. A quiet place, although it could be better preserved.

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos -
description: Quiet area next to the Iznajar reservoir and next to the trail for hiking or biking. It has no water intake or possibility of emptying.

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - CO-9003
description: Spring with good drinking water on the street side

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - MA-202
description: Mirador Viewpoint. Parked overnight flat. One other van joined us. Normally a viewpoint but trees restrict any view.

title: (14970) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: This is not a car park just an overnight parking spot in a dead end.

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - 22 Calle Valentina
title_short: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - 22 Calle Valentina
description: New free area for motorhomes and campers in Cuevas de San Marcos (Málaga). There are three parks very close. Supermarket, bars and sports pavilion less than 5 minutes walk. It has filling and emptying of water. Places of interest to visit: Cueva de Belda, Sierra del Camorro where you can take several hiking trails and visit various viewpoints, Iznajar Reservoir, Genil River. In addition, in the municipality there are several museums such as the toy museum or the path of the millennia.

title: (14978) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - Unnamed Road
title_short: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - Unnamed Road
description: Parking and starting point for the circular walk to the caves. I recommend starting the hike east, clockwise.

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos -
description: On the road to the park in nature P4N spot. It’s a bit down hill but is easily accessible for all types of vehicles. It’s in a very green shady area, which must be nice in summers. It’s nice to hike up the road to the other P4N place and Cueva Nueva. From there it’s easy to climb further if you wish to do so.

name: Camping Valdearenas in Iznajar SL.
title: (14979) Camping Valdearenas in Iznajar SL.
description: Camping Valdearenas! Family camping in the countryside. Nautical activities on the lake. Beach valdearenas

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos -
description: Quiet place surrounded by nature, perfect for visiting Cueva Belda, the viewpoint of Cueva Nueva and very close to one of the via ferratas in the mountains. The access road is a bit steep but it is not difficult to get there.

title: (14979) Iznájar - 5 Calle las Angosturas
description: Parking Next to the Iznajar Pantano Beach. In El Chiringuito de Valdearenas de Gracia and Paco. Super quiet place at night. By day it fills up. We enter with an AC of 7.10 meters without problem as long as you put your ass towards the swamp.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 14 Calle los Arrayanes
description: Area in front of a playground where you can park (two motorhomes fit loose). we have spent a very quiet night in absolute silence. It is also great to enjoy as a family, both for the playground, as for the small forest behind. And, of course, the Valdearenas beach 100 meters away.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 3 Calle los Farfanes
description: Unpaved place on the outskirts of the village. Great view, quiet nights. Camping ban signs . Drinking water at several taps in the direction of the reservoir exhibition.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 1 Calle el Remolino
description: Multisport center parking area, flat, gravel, garbage cans but no service. Free. Lake nearby.

title: (14979) Iznájar - 21 Calle los Arrayanes
description: Water fountain near play area, just passed the Sports facilities. There is also another water source with a screw fitting coming out of the ground further down from the fountain.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 208 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Viewpoint with benches, bins and drinking water point...no long term parking. Water only runs at 3 liters per minute, 1/2 inch thread.

title: (14970) Iznájar - A-333
description: Easy parking for larger vehicles. Hard and level surface

title: (14978) Iznájar - A-333
description: Small parking for 3 motor homes of 6m or Campers. Right at the end of the bridge over the swamp of Iznájar. Noisy on the road but an option to hang out

title: (14970) Iznájar - 20 Calle las Tres Cruces
description: Perfect, a bit crooked

title: (14970) Iznájar - 1 Plaza de la Venta
description: Small parking lot to visit the village, overnight possible, easily accessible, can be full of cars, but easy ½ ride.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 2 Paseo Donantes de Sangre
description: Parking area where you can spend the night. Very close to the reservoir and with a large sunny square next to it, as well as a park with swings and picnic tables just below.

title: (14970) Iznájar - Paseo Donantes de Sangre
description: Very nice place at the edge of a path that runs along the lake. The location is quite flat and offers a wonderful view of the lake and the white village of Iznajar. Very calm with some joggers in the morning

title: (14970) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: If you have a large motorhome it is practically impossible to go beyond this point and reach the shores of the lake. The road slopes dangerously sideways (except for cars). to get here there is a small descent, a bit narrow but doable. in two minutes you can easily reach the lake on foot. super quiet area and with good 4g reception. take the rubbish away because there are no bins.

title: (14970) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent site in the middle of nature on the edge of the artificial lake. Attention only accessible small vans. Dirt track accessible from the road heading east before the Casa del Olivar. The road from Merendero Iznajar (place located on the cliffs) has collapsed.

title: (14900) Lucena - CO-6218
description: Sierra de Aras, very close to the Sudbetica

title: (14900) Lucena - Co-6218
description: Dirt and stone parking going up to the sanctuary. No services. There is no prohibition sign. Nice views . uneven terrain. Very quiet at night, only cars that go up to the sanctuary

title: (14817) Priego de Córdoba - 86 Avenida Priego
description: It is a flat area next to the road where you can park. From this point the route begins towards La Tiñosa, the highest peak in the province of Córdoba. It is located in the village of Las Lagunillas and there is a bar, bakery, supermarket, tobacconist, etc. nearby. Being about 20 meters from the road, vehicles can be heard but there is little traffic, since it is a secondary road that goes from Priego to Rute passing through villages. They fit 3 AC of 7.5m, the maneuver is easy and it is quite flat, in general very quiet. The townspeople / hamlet come by and say hello kindly.

title: (14913) Zurreón -
description: Nice place for an undisturbed longer stay. Good access to the river. Every now and then a few bathers come from the village, all very nice! Great for dogs.

title: (14811) Los Villares - 34 Diseminado los Villares
description: Camping- Cortijo Los Villares. Posada Niña Margarita. Motorhome and Camper area. Spectacular enclave for recreation and activities in the mountains. The owner offers accommodation at the Posada if you do not have a Camper or similar. There is also a bar service and meals. We only have 12 plots that give you an authentic family atmosphere and with a 100% guarantee of disconnection and relaxation. The 12 plots with access to electricity and 6 plots without electricity. In La Posada, which is 100 meters away, is the reception. There is a bar and very good internet connection. In spring and summer the Garden works and it is possible to buy totally organic vegetables or share a good time with the "Innkeeper"

title: (18312) Iznájar - 31 Calle Granada de Ventorros de Balerma
title_short: (18312) Iznájar - 31 Calle Granada de Ventorros de Balerma
description: Area with a beautiful view of the Iznajar dam, in a very quiet village. With fountains for water filling and next to the playground. On Sundays there is a street market so it is best to park near the school.

address.street: 31 Calle Granada de Ventorros de Balerma

title: (14900) Lucena - 4 Calle Las Acacias
description: Newly opened laundry from January 30, 2021

title: (14900) Lucena - 13 Ronda Cuatro Caminos
description: Parking without services, a bit noisy due to the proximity of the road, quiet night.

title: (29311) - 5 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Casa Valle de Oro welcomes people traveling in their motorhome or motorhome (max 7 meters). No caravans. Maximum 2 people. Maximum 2 dogs, no cats. We have only 1 parking place between old olive trees, next to a gorge where a small river flows. Enjoy a wonderful holiday sheltered by beautiful olive trees, lounging by the pool or in the zen pool. Relax with a book from our library. Put on your hiking boots and explore the countryside. Take pictures of the beautiful surroundings. Or do nothing - nothing at all. Casa Valle de Oro is an idyllic spot in an unspoilt environment, perfect for stargazing. On our roof terrace you can enjoy beautiful views and spectacular sunsets. This is pampered camping and you are guaranteed to leave with charged batteries :-) . You can only use a private bathroom in the winter season. In the summer season this is only possible when a yurt bathroom is available. If not, there is an outdoor shower by the pool (cold water). There is a toilet room with sink (hot water). Electricity and water are free. Please check 1 day in advance for availability as we only have one motorhome pitch. Check in from 2pm - check out 11am

title: (14900) Lucena - 22 Calle la Tinaja
description: Ample public parking to visit, five minutes from The Town Center

title: () Loja - CP-74
description: Several spots at side of very quiet rural gravel road on a firm mostly level grassy verge with beautiful views of valley below. Not a single car passed us by on a Friday night. We think there are only 3 or 4 houses further down the road so very quiet indeed.

title: (29220) Cuevas Bajas -
description: Parking area next to a picnic area! Right at the entrance to the town! If you find shade you will be very comfortable! We have stopped to eat and rest and we have not had any problems!

title: (14900) Lucena - 9 Avenida de la Guardia Civil
title_short: (14900) Lucena - 9 Avenida de la Guardia Civil
description: Enerplus fuel and LPG. Priced 10% below most others 4/2023. Helpful staff and had LPG adaptors.

title: (14900) Lucena - 5D Ronda de San Francisco
description: Public laundry, from the Speed queen franchise.

title: (14900) Lucena - 1 Calle Ssgg

title: (14900) Lucena - 14D Calle Ssgg
description: Very quiet parking during the day and at night next to some urban orchards

title: (14910) Benamejí - 5 Calle Blas Infante
description: We stopped here on the way home to rest. The area is paved and a quiet street, Right next to the municipal swimming pool, there is no traffic or noise, we took a walk through the town it is small but pleasant

title: (14900) Lucena - 6 Calle Ssgg
description: Very quiet parking next to the football stadium

description:
Housing vehicle area with loading and unloading area for gray and black water.

Opening windows is allowed. On Thursdays it is allowed to park, although part of the enclosure is used for the market.

title: (14910) Benamejí - 75 Calle Mariana Pineda

title: (14910) Benamejí - Carretera Córdoba - Málaga
description: Small clearing on the shore of the Genil under the ancient bridge of the National Four. Get off just before the bridge to the left as you get off El Tejar. Beware of the current of the River.

title: (14940) Cabra - 156 Calle Aradillo
description: Free parking and service area, with picnic tables. It's a lovely place next to a park. Direct access to the cycle path "via verde del aceite" on an old railway line. Parking 72 hours maximum. Prohibited camping behavior: no unpacking of tables, chairs, barbecue, awning, laundry drying, stabilizer feet, etc.

title: (29310) Villanueva de Algaidas - 2 Avenida Escultor Berrocal
title_short: (29310) Villanueva de Algaidas - 2 Avenida Escultor Berrocal
description: RV park with service point outside the village center, easy to find with the coordinates. November 2022, the supply and disposal area has been redesigned, water is available with good pressure

title: (14810) Carcabuey - 2 A-340
description: Picnic area with shadows

title: (14940) Cabra -
description: Very modern laundry. The machines even have a multilingual menu. Has a machine where you can change banknotes into coins.

title: (14940) Cabra - 4 Avenida González Meneses
description: An open space where two vans have spent the weekend quietly, without problems, without noise, the local police passed by and they did not tell us anything. Perhaps for large vehicles the entrance is not as good as it should be, but for Camper it is ideal. The RV park was packed and we found this. There is a Lidl and a Mercadona nearby, a sports pavilion nearby with services and a laundry opposite the pavilion.

title: (14940) Cabra - 99 Calle Santa Teresa de Jornet

title_short: (14940) Ermita Virgen de la Sierra - Sendero Río Bailón
description: Parking on one side somewhat inclined, on the other flat. Start of hiking and biking trails.

title: (14940) Cabra - 3 Calle Junquillo
description: Station for washing tall vehicles, with a pressure gun, it does not have a platform to clean the roofs well, but it is used to remove dust from the vehicle, it goes with coins. It has bathrooms during working hours, if the operator is already out, they remain closed. Just opposite is the Children's City, which is a very well set up park for children, it's great.

title: (14940) Cabra - 48D Calle Cuesta de los Barreros
title_short: (14940) Cabra - 48D Calle Cuesta de los Barreros
description: Parking with enough spaces. Ideal if the area (2 squares) is occupied by cars. The center is close.

title: (14940) Cabra - 5 Calle Belén
description: Space in Cabra II.- One of the areas available for the city. Services and supermarket are spread throughout the country (*) Note: Saturday from 7am, a flea market in the parking lot becomes, so it should be considered if Sunday night is the night.

title: (14940) Cabra - CP-115
description: In the parking lot of the "mirrador sobre la nava". No service. 4g Vodafone ok. Close to the Hermitage.

title: (14940) Ermita Virgen de la Sierra - CP-115
title_short: (14940) Ermita Virgen de la Sierra - CP-115
description: Along the road with little traffic and in a pine forest which shelters a little from the wind, unlike the car park above. Almost flat, quiet, very good for one night and then to go to the hermitage.

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 66 Avenida D Niceto Alcalá Zamora y Torres
title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 66 Avenida D Niceto Alcalá Zamora y Torres
description:
Free space with services. Gray water, WC, water and cans. It is a quiet place.

The entrance passes through a park, it is at the fairgrounds.

About 20 minutes walk from the city center.

Access prohibited on Saturdays from 8 a.m. to 3 p.m.

address.street: 66 Avenida D Niceto Alcalá Zamora y Torres

name: Área autocaravanas Priego de Córdoba
title: (14800) Área autocaravanas Priego de Córdoba
description:
Area in Priego de Córdoba. 
Municipal free pitch with supply and disposal. The pitch is mostly very sloping. Quiet location next to a beautiful park. Shops and restaurants are located in the city center of 2 km. The area. There is no access in or out on Saturdays between 7am and 3pm due to market.

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 0 Calle Huerto Almarcha
title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 0 Calle Huerto Almarcha

title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 22 Calle Ramón y Cajal

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 15 Calle San Luis
title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 15 Calle San Luis

Possibility of parking several motorhomes but I do not know the usual occupation during the week, but today the park is almost empty. Have a nice stay in Andalusia!

title: (14900) Lucena - KM 51 Autovía de Málaga

description:
Great spot. Very quiet.
Hard gravel slightly sloping.
East facing.

title: (18313) Riofrío - 10 Plaza San Isidro
description: Good site. on the banks of the river.  on the village square, there is a good lighting and many restaurants.  very quiet. village famous for its caviar

title: (18313) Riofrío - 41 Plaza San Isidro
description: Where there is a source of drinking water

title: (18313) Riofrío - 6 Fuente la Trucha
description:
Great place to stay by the sound of a river flowing next to a large ruin, at night very chilled out, just some soft sounds of ducks, geese and cats which are lovely to visit and meet. also a great walkway shed nature over the ancient ruins with the nice cold river passing by. Of course, there are no signs that you cannot spend the night here, so it is worth visiting for one night.

About 20 meters to the right where there are some stairs to the river, water falls from a pipe where the locals go to collect it in jugs, ideal for drinking or refilling jugs.

title: (29300) Archidona - 5 Calle Lavanderos
description: Very quiet place to sleep

description: On the edge of the road, but with little passage, except some cars, mountain biking, hiker and shepherd, visit the cave or walk, CC good, no service.

title: (18300) Loja - A-92
description: Service station on the A92 Manzanil motorway in the service area towards Malaga. Burger King until 1:00 and area Open 24/24. Restaurant, cafe, hotel. Large parking lot for the night.

title: (29300) Archidona - 237 Urbanización Chico Alberiz
description: Parking, quiet and close to Mercadona to get to know Archidona

title: (18300) Loja - km 189 A-92
description: On the A92 motorway and strategically located, is the Abades Loja service area. Its location allows it to be very close to the cities of Malaga, Granada, Jaen and Cordoba. Thanks to its cafeteria, self service, à la carte restaurant and gastronomy for events, Abades Loja offers a gastronomic proposal that adapts to any type of client. In addition, it has different gift and souvenir shops, a parapharmacy, and a themed shop specializing in products made with extra virgin olive oil. Its facilities have free parking for customers and a special area for tourist buses and large vehicles. Inside we find an area for ablutions and Halal food.

title: (18300) Loja - 19 Avenida Fernando de los Rios
title_short: (18300) Loja - 19 Avenida Fernando de los Rios
description: Facing the football field at the end of the road. Nice we could let go of the dog. It was a Friday training until 9:30 pm without genes.

title_short: (14940) Monturque - 13 Calle Vial 2 SR-2 Ladera Sur

title: (18300) Loja - 24 Calle Rafael Pérez del Álamo
title_short: (18300) Loja - 24 Calle Rafael Pérez del Álamo
description: Parking next to the municipal pavilion of Loja. Right next to the pantry restaurant where asking for a drink you get very good tapas for free and right next to it is the bonachera bakery where you can buy bread and sweets typical of Loja such as their donuts or cinnamon buns.

title: (18300) Loja -
description:
Even better then the one next to here. Less highway noise and zero traffic. It's next to an old rock quarry. The road there has some overhanging bushes, but nothing too scratchy.

If you're looking for shelter from wind or sun, you can even park in the quarry. The spaces are plenty and flat. Good views and trials all around. A few hikers. You can join them and make a short or long hike in the hills.

title: (18300) Loja - C. Carmen de los Angeles
title_short: (18300) Loja - C. Carmen de los Angeles
description:
Large flat field with a lot of space, it is 3 min walk from the center and with various services such as laundry at 100 MTR, several bakeries, pastry shops also at 100 MTR.
edit ....is now a tarmac car park
take first right out of carpark and along near the cafes ....other routes out roads are too small .check first because is a long way to reverse !

title: (41570) Badolatosa - 9 Carretera Casariche
description: Walkway wash

title: (18300) Loja - 21 Avenida Alcaudique
description: Quiet field next to the cemetery

title: (29314) Archidona - A-7282
description: The showers and toilets were very clean. Staff also great.

title: (18300) Loja - 77 Avenida Andalucía
description: Place with walkway to wash the motorhome

title: (18300) Loja - 15 Avenida de la Paz
description: Quiet place to spend the day, next to the Mercadona

title: (14812) Almedinilla - Calle Media Era, 1
description: Quiet and quite flat street, next to a gym park and soccer field. Near the municipal pool, ideal in summer. Without services. Perfect to visit Almedinilla and close to shops and bars that serve you free tapas. Almedinilla is beautiful, with fountains, flower patios and pretty trails. Its Iberian settlement, the Roman villa and the waterfall of the horse jumping to Fuente Grande is a must visit. We have spent three days here and great. It is a quiet and safe town.

title: (29530) Alameda - 3 Calle Joaquín Blume
description: Very quiet parking, just behind the Guardia Civil barracks, very close to bars and next to the municipal sports center

title: (18300) Loja - 1B Urbanización Suelo Urbano S-12
description: Drinking water in pressure tap, difficult to connect with a hose but good for filling a jerry can.

title: (14812) Almedinilla - 1E Paseo Moreras
description: Site to leave without problems and spend the night. It is next to a park in general you have everything and it is a town with a lot of history it is recommended to go to the tourist office and ask for information

title: (29313) Villanueva del Trabuco - A-7203
description: Gas station with showers

title: (14812) Almedinilla - 33 Paseo Alameda
description: Information Point Parking to see the incredible ruins of El Ruedo, a Roman villa from the 1st century AD.

title: (29300) Archidona -
description: The Saucedilla! Rural Tourism House. Car parking, motorhomes, caravans and camper vans.

title: (29313) illanueva del Trabuco - Crta de Granada, Km 7
title_short: (29313) illanueva del Trabuco - Crta de Granada, Km 7
description: Showering is possible here. Ask at the bar in the restaurant of the Repsol petrol station - then up the stairs on the right and the first door on the left. A whole room with shower, toilet and hairdryer. water is hot! staff very nice!

title: (14880) Luque - CO-6203
description: Cemetery parking. tranquility.  Other accessible parking in the center of the village but just for the visit not to be missed.

title: (14880) Luque - 21 Carretera de Córdoba
description: Beautiful natural area next to the green way of oil, the natural park of the Sierra Subbética. Close to Nicol's restaurant. Bicycle route and hiking towards Jaen and towards Cabra.

title: (14857) - 499 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Picnic area with shadows, tables and playground. Very calm.

title: (18300) Venta del Rayo - Unnamed Road
description:
Parking next to the Sierra Gorda Viewpoint, in the middle of a wind farm with incredible views and sunsets. Access by forest tracks with some steep slopes. To access it, you have to do it from the Los Abades service station. If you put the GPS on, you have to take the detour to the left in the Majada del Charco Negro and then take the path that comes out to the right.
Access is not allowed from June to September.

title: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 5 Calle Zona de Valor 13
title_short: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 5 Calle Zona de Valor 13
description: Quiet free parking with many places. We stopped here on our way from Malaga to Granada. Between park and football field.

title: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 7 Calle Rosalía de Castro
title_short: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 7 Calle Rosalía de Castro
description: Water fountain on the street. Parking on the street.

title: (29200) Antequera - A-7282
description: The perfect place to start your ascent to El Peñon De Los Enamorados.  The access is slightly rocky, but easy.  Larger campers should have no problem with access.  Calm all night long.  In the morning, a beautiful view of the mountain.

title: (29313) Villanueva del Trabuco - 29A Diseminado Poligono 11
description: If you let your camper ventilate at night by opening a window, several dogs will keep you awake at night. In the early morning cars, trucks and tractors drive past this place.

title: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 59 Calle Jaen
description: Self-service laundry. Easy parking. Bars nearby.

title: (18310) Salar - A-4155
description: Gas station on a country road with gray and black water drain and drinking water hose. Next to it is a camper pitch on flat, somewhat dusty ground. A sign explicitly allows camping for 24 hours. There is space for at least two WoMos. Picnic tables are also part of the complimentary service.

title: (14500) Puente Genil - CO-764
description: Parking at Campo Real train station, where the Subbetica greenway begins.

title: (18360) Huétor Tájar - Carretera Granada Sevilla
description: Rest area with sitting area, showers and gas. The restaurant that offers services is called Área Vega del Poniente. nice shower. Clean toilets. Friendly staff, despite my terrible Spanish. Open from 6am to midnight daily.

title: (18270) Montefrío - 3 Huerta Hospital
description: Good parking to visit the town

title: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 1 Calle Patio de los Leones
title_short: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 1 Calle Patio de los Leones
description: Free parking day and night next to the Genil river where you can find restaurants, shops, parks. Quiet area to visit the town and many activities that take place throughout the year.

title: (18360) Huétor Tájar - 35 Calle Velázquez
description: A parking lot near the city, where we slept and ate in the evening. Passing by but rather nice people. The children came to see the camper discreetly. Between a clay football pitch and the town bowling alley. Shops nearby

title: (18270) Montefrío - 12 Avenida Antonio Luis Soler
description: According to National Geographic this village is in the top 10 in the world in terms of views, beautiful village. Where I am about three places for motorhome, but there is another area in the city Funeral for 10 motorhomes.

title: (14880) Luque - CO-6204
description:
Parking actually for the excursion point
"Laguna del Salobral.
However, the lagoon has completely dried up. so it is rarely visited.
A very very quiet place.
In the midst of olive plantations.
No problems.

The place is right on the bike path
"Via Verde del Aceite"
This bike path is an open railway line. (olive oil train). In this area it runs through a very beautiful part of Andalusia. Over bridges and small gorges, almost flat.
Ideal for small bike tours.

title: (18270) Montefrío - 9 Calle Manuel de Falla
description: Parking without problem for the night and without traffic. Next to the door of a supermarket. With views of the villa and castle of Montefrio.

title: (14550) Montilla - 1582 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking of Cerro don Juan in Montilla beautiful views and a cool place in summer within what is the clear countryside. To go out by bike and visit wine presses, nearby is the white press or the Bourbons with great wines and very good views .

title: (14850) Baena - 38 Poligono Pau
description: Picnic site. Fairly flat. Bins. Good view of town. Best access is immediately beside Lidl on the edge of village. The road is single track with no passing places for about 400m. Well above the main road so fairly quiet.

title: (18360) Venta Nueva - GR-4400
description: Gas station you can change black and gray water and remember clean water, in exchange you fill diesel

title: (14920) Córdoba - 1 Calle Diseminado Infl Carretera
description: Parking and picnic area before reaching the Zoñar Lagoons, a quiet place for a rest stop en route, does not indicate any overnight prohibition. This visitor center near the Zoñar lagoons, a protected area of high ecological interest. many trails.

title: (14920) Aguilar de la Frontera - Carretera a a-304
title_short: (14920) Aguilar de la Frontera - Carretera a a-304
description: Parking with some shadows and picnic area in the parking lot of the visitor center of the Lagunas de Zoñar, a place of high ecological level, protected space, good for a rest, there are no prohibition signs, hiking trails and bird watching.

title: (18310) Salar - 211 Barrio Sau
description: Quiet place where you can sleep, fits a long motorhome.

title: (29533) Los Carvajales - 35 Barriada los Carvajales
description: Water hole in the village with 2 exit points

title: (29312) - 17 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Gas station with very clean bathrooms and showers and a bar, open all night, we have spent the night here and it is very quiet. Recommended for a stopover or when passing through for a night

title: (29313) Villanueva del Trabuco - 24 Diseminado Poligono 13
description: Recreation area. Next to the source of the 100 pipes, very pleasant.

title: (14850) Baena - 30 Calle Demetrio de los Ríos
title_short: (14850) Baena - 30 Calle Demetrio de los Ríos
description: The car park, although slightly inclined, is close to the monumental area, quiet area next to a small park.

name: El Puerto del Jaral
title: (29312) El Puerto del Jaral
description:
"El Puerto del Jaral" is a 130 year old, secluded cortijo (farm) surrounded by nature, olive and almond trees.
Only 3 km from the A-92M, Málaga - Granada.
There is room for 2 campers.

Reservation required, see contact

There is the possibility to receive a relaxing healing session / chakra healing / sound healing upon booking, see contact.
Welcome, Franck and Martine

title: (29532) Mollina - MA-701
description: Recreational area of ​​Santillán. Recreation area of ​​the village of Mollina 5 km from the city. Very calm during working days. Drinking water, barbecues, tables and services.

title: (29532) Mollina - MA-703
description: Quiet spot outside the picnic area. spent one night no problem. trees for shade. room for 5 vans. level ground and easy access

title: (14850) Baena - 88T Avenida Padre Villoslada
description: Parking with beautiful views of the town in a quiet neighborhood. Nearby there is a children's play area and a soccer field. Right next door there is a Carrefour with a gas station and a water outlet, as well as a car wash. It is right at the entrance of the town, close to the road.

title: (14850) Baena - 1 Calle Iznajar
description: Paved parking for cars. No services. At 10 minutes from the center.

title: (29312) - 106 Diseminado Diseminados
description: THE PLACE: Fully fenced private estate, ideal for safe parking and enjoying the incomparable natural surroundings. WARNING: The entrance is somewhat complex and has some unevenness, so it is not suitable for low or too long vehicles. THE SERVICES: The car park is not completely flat, but people who have tried it have found it comfortable enough. We can offer water, electricity for charging (not for permanent use) and we have a separate toilet, although hot water is not currently running. ABOUT US: We are a couple who love nature and the quiet life, we love to welcome travellers to travel through their stories. We are new to the platform and for sure we have a lot to learn and improve. Our dog, Pancho, is very noble and does not generate problems with other dogs, although he does not like cats very much. WHERE WE ARE: We are only 3 km from exit 16 of the A-92M motorway in a place of easy access (there are only 100 metres of dirt road in good condition). CONSULT AVAILABILITY: WhatsApp or Email.

title: (14850) Baena - 1 Calle Guardia Civil
description: Esplanade stadium occupied by carnival during the holy week 2017 (April 12) we found this large parking near the high school, flat, cemented and very quiet (school holidays?) With bins and fallow land ideal for taking out the dog.

title: (29313) Villanueva del Trabuco - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place and lot of space. Nice wiew. Water is nearby

title: (23689) - Camino Olivares
description: Almazara au milieu de la nature, des activités touristiques et de l'expérience organoleptique. Vous pouvez obtenir de l'huile d'olive extra vierge de Jaén. Un charmant village où vous pourrez profiter des couchers de soleil de la subbética Cordoue et de la sierra méridionale de Jaén. La tranquillité est l'atmosphère qui règne ici. Des itinéraires sont disponibles à proximité pour faire du vélo et de la marche. Idéal pour aller avec des enfants.

title: (14920) - 8 Calle Diseminado Infl Carretera
description: Quiet, wooded area with lots of shade, stone tables and benches, without services. Ideal for stopping and spending the night. Flat land near the road.

title: (29532) Mollina - 2 Poligono UR.I.1 Caseria del Rey

title: () Alfarnate - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area surrounded by trees and with an arboreal adventure park managed by the "Los Pindongos" group. It is an esplanade with (closed) facilities that correspond to an old camping project. Magnificent area to spend a few days of hiking and adventure! Fairly quiet.

title_short: (14500) Puente Genil - 2 Calle Concejal Jose Navas
description: Plain with stones prepared for parking. 10 minutes walk from the center. It's not a lovely place but to park and see the decorated Christmas streets is fine

title: (14500) Puente Genil - 1 Calle Sauce
description: Public motorhome area with grey, black and drinking water emptying service. Next to the shopping center, cinema, bowling alley and gas stations, about 300 meters from the city center and next to the bike path. Visit its old town, bridge, Alianza, Fuente Álamo and its lighting at Christmas. The city of Light, where the Sun becomes sweet.

title: (18369) Villanueva Mesía -
description:
Flat esplanade in the "Cerro Colorao" ideal for a van or a small AC.
Very close to the rural hostel Cortijo del Guarda.
Quiet place with little vehicle traffic. You can take a walk to the Genil River dam.
no service

title: (29312) Villanueva del Rosario - 12 Calle Arroyo
description: Location easily accessible from the highway, plenty of room, very quiet at night, perfect for a overnight stopover. There are garbage cans at the end of the street. Cars and walkers start to pass around 7: 30-8: 00 on weekdays, the rest of the night, not a noise. View of the mountain and the village which looks rather cute.

title: (14500) Puente Genil - 13 Calle Montalbán
description: Wide esplanade with easy access, just 5 minutes walk from the town center, 20 minutes from the old town. Ideal to walk through its streets, see the spectacular lighting of the "city of light", visit its Christmas market (Parque de los Pinos). Quiet area to sleep. Puente Genil, where "the sun becomes sweet". At the foot of the bike path, ideal for a walk with children. Although it has no connection with the oil greenway (for this, go to the old Campo Real station). Without services, possibility of toilets in supermarket.

title: (29312) Villanueva del Rosario - 116 Calle Arroyo
description: Source of water "old source". Clean source and very good water.
